spells.description:
Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either assive or iniature for 30 sec.

iniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 980 and Haste by 2,651.

assive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 192,568, and Agility by 2,446.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to let loose a nascent empowerment from the crystal, increasing a random secondary stat by 3,027 for 20 sec.

Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
